title: Understanding Personality
text: Personality refers to the unique characteristics that define an individual. It includes patterns of thoughts, emotions, and behaviors.

title: Characteristics of Personality
text: Consider what makes each person unique and how these traits are consistent over time.

hintAnswer: unique and enduring patterns of thoughts, emotions, and behaviors that characterize individuals and distinguish them from others
title: Defining Personality
text: What are the key components that make up a person's personality?
choices: rigid and inflexible traits that are pervasive and persist over time

cognition (ways of perceiving and interpreting self, other people, or events), affectivity (the range, intensity, lability, and appropriateness of emotional response), interpersonal functioning, and impulse control
unique and enduring patterns of thoughts, emotions, and behaviors that characterize individuals and distinguish them from others
